channel.title: Mundo DIY on Mans i Art
channel.description: Recent content in Mundo DIY on Mans i Art

item.title: How to test dark mode?
item.description: You can set dark mode as default by setting params.mode to dark in config.toml or set it to auto which will detect based on your OS and switch to dark mode.

item.title: Typography
item.description: Lid est laborum et dolorum fuga. Et harum quidem rerum facilis est et expeditasi distinctio. Nam libero tempore, cum soluta nobis est eligendi optio cumque nihilse impedit quo minus id quod amets untra dolor amet sad.

item.title: Hugo shortcodes
item.description: Images Dave Herring Dave Herring Github Gist Youtube video Tweet Hugo 0.

item.title: Getting Started with Traveling Ultralight
item.description: I’m on a trip at the moment, and a friend who generously let me sleep on his couch looked at my small travel backpack and commented on how little I travel with: “That’s impressive,” he said.

item.title: How I Learned to Stop Procrastinating, & Love Letting Go
item.description: The end of procrastination is the art of letting go. I’ve been a lifelong procrastinator, at least until recent years. I would put things off until deadline, because I knew I could come through.

item.title: Fearlessness: How to Stop Running from Space
item.description: We spend our days filling in every available space, cramming in more tasks, responding to messages, checking social media and online sites, watching videos.

item.title: Primer: When You Have Too Much to Do
item.description: You have a to-do list that scrolls on for days. You are managing multiple projects, getting lots of email and messages on different messaging systems, managing finances and personal health habits and so much more.

item.title: Ipsum
item.description: Nullam et orci eu lorem consequat tincidunt vivamus et sagittis magna sed nunc rhoncus condimentum sem. In efficitur ligula tate urna.
